channel.title: Candidates on airdb
channel.description: Recent content in Candidates on airdb

item.description: Phone Interview Questions About You # Tell me about yourself. # Good afteernoon, I will appreciate it that you give me an opportunity to introduce myself now. My name is xxx zhang, and you can call me dean in english. I come from shenzhen. Now I am a sre engernier and I’m working for xx now, which is the best degtail bank online of china. I had worked for xx in 2 years ago.
Github 面试题 # # 计算机基础 数据结构与算法 Go语言面试问答

Phone Interview Questions About the New Job and the Company # What interests you about this job? # Why do you want this job? # What applicable attributes/experience do you have? # Are you overqualified for this job? # What can you do for this company? # What do you know about this company? # Why do you want to work here? # What challenges are you looking for in a position?

Phone Interview Questions About You # Tell me about yourself. # What are you looking for in your next job? What is important to you? # What is your greatest weakness? # What is your greatest strength? # Describe a typical work week. # How would you describe the pace at which you work? # How do you handle stress and pressure? # What motivates you?

Phone Interview Questions About Your Background # Work history questions: name of company, job title and job description, dates of employment. # What were your starting and final levels of compensation? # What were your responsibilities? # What major challenges and problems did you face? How did you handle them? # Why are you leaving your job? # What are your salary expectations? #
运维问题 # 磁盘告警 # CPU 高 # 数据不一致 #
